patient information.sexual history: Relevant details about patient's sexual history
patient information.drug usage: Information about any drugs used by patient

current symptoms.name of symptom: Specific symptom experienced by the patient
current symptoms.intensity of symptom: Severity or intensity of the symptom
current symptoms.when did the symptom appear: Time of onset for the symptom
current symptoms.temporalisation: Any specific timing patterns associated with the symptom

previous diagnostics.severity: Severity level of the diagnosed condition
previous diagnostics.reaction to treatment: Patient's reaction or response to the prescribed treatment

current medication.name of medication: Medications currently being taken by the patient
current medication.dosage: Amount or strength of the medication
current medication.frequency: How often the medication is taken
current medication.duration: The length of time the patient has been taking the medication
current medication.reason for taking: The medical reason for taking each medication

patient medical history.physiological context: Relevant physiological history of the patient
patient medical history.psychological context: Relevant psychological history of the patient
patient medical history.vaccination history: History of vaccinations received by the patient
patient medical history.recent surgeries: Details about any recent surgeries undergone by the patient
patient medical history.allergies: Any known allergies of the patient

visit conclusion.diagnosis: Final diagnosis or assessment from the visit
visit conclusion.prescribed treatment: Treatment plan prescribed for the patient
visit conclusion.other specialist to consult: Recommendation for consulting other specialists if needed
